#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

void solve(){
	int a[3];
	cin >> a[0] >> a[1] >> a[2];
	sort(a,a+3);
	if (a[2] > a[0]+a[1])
		cout << "Alice\n";
	else if ((a[1]+a[2]+a[0])%2 == 0)
		cout << "Bob\n";
	else 
		cout << "Alice\n";
}

int main() 
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int t;cin >> t;
	while(t--){solve();}
	return 0;
}
